nodes.text: The Sullustan task force was a Galactic Republic naval unit that participated in the Clone Wars.
The task force consisted of four Acclamator-class assault ships and scores of Republic gunships.

During the Clone Wars, the Jedi Grand Master Yoda commandeered the Sullustan task force and used it to reinforce Republic forces on the planet of Argul, who were fighting Separatist forces on the world. When the task force arrived on Argul, it quickly turned the the tide of the battle in favor of the Republic, leading to an eventual Republic victory on the world.
